mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(EXHIBITION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXHIBITION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(RECEPTION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RECEPTION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DATE FROM NOTICE_INFO ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(EXHIBITION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXHIBITION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(RECEPTION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RECEPTION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DATE FROM NOTICE_INFO WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{notice_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_INFO ( NOTICE_TITLE, RECEPTION_DATE, END_DATE, EXHIBITION_DATE, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT )VALUES( #{notice_title}, #{reception_date}, #{end_date}, #{exhibition_date}, '1', NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM NOTICE_INFO WHERE POST_NO IN #{notice_no}
